name: Heresy (itch) (OvioStudios)
description:
Heresy is a fast bass boss battle where you have to face of against a terrifying demon.

Use everything you have at your disposal to defeat him and his minions before they overcome you!

Controls: 

Move: WASD

LMB = Attack

RMB = Special Attack

Space = Sprint

Shift = Dash

Made with "NoahMT" for a school project at AIE!
